item.title: Master Career Breaks with Confidence ✨ • Address gaps directly in your resume. • Highlight skills gained during breaks. • Use: “I managed a household budget of $50K annually.” • Connect experiences to the job you're applying for. • Maintain a positive tone about your past choices. How can you reframe your career break to demonstrate valuable skills? #career gaps #resume tips
